rules.description: SpaceFN (Kai): Space+s/g to Space/Escape (hold to repeat)
SpaceFN: Space+[hjkl] to Left, Down, Up, Right
SpaceFN: Space+[uopnm] to Home, End, PgUp, PgDown, Return
Change caps_lock to control if pressed with other keys, to escape if pressed alone.
Change cmd to cmd if pressed with other keys, to f20 if pressed alone.
Magic caps lock: escape if alone, modifier otherwise
Change caps_lock to control if pressed with other keys, to escape if pressed alone.
Change cmd to cmd if pressed with other keys, toggle vinav if pressed alone.
Change caps_lock to control if pressed with other keys, to escape if pressed alone.
Space as modifier, as itself when pressed alone
